DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether myofascial release technique are effective in the treatment of low back pain due to lumbar disc herniation.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Myofascial Release Technique on Reducing Symptoms in Patients With Chronic Disc Protrusion
DOC.criteria: lumbar disc herniation Muscular trriger points independent ambulated patients Neoplasm Lumbar surgery history fracture inflammatory disease
